description_carte: Virgo watches over a blighted harvest. Where she treads, only thorns and rot remain.
description_visuelle: A gaunt woman with thorny vines coiling around her limbs. Her eyes are hollow, and she carries a scythe dripping with black ichor. Dead flowers sprout from her hair.

skills.name: Rotting Touch
skills.description: Deals earth damage and applies a poison effect.

skills.name: Thorny Embrace
skills.description: Deals damage based on defense and heals Virgo.

skills.name: Harvest of Despair
skills.description: Deals massive earth damage to all enemies, with a chance to apply poison.
